item.title: SiTime 发布面向可穿戴设备的新芯片
item.description: SiTime 周三发布了一款新芯片，旨在帮助其进入一个价值 40 亿美元的市场，并在可穿戴电子设备领域赢得客户。【原文：SiTime on Wednesday released a new chip aimed at helping it enter a $4 billion market and land customers in wearable electronic devices.】

item.title: 米兰的美联储异议引起轰动，但未能左右结果
item.description: 如果说唐纳德-特朗普总统希望让一位亲密盟友加入美联储能成为头条新闻的话，那么白宫经济顾问斯蒂芬-米兰（Stephen Miran）周三的反对意见和远低于共识的利率预测则为他赢得了头条新闻。【原文：If President Donald Trump hoped that putting a close ally at the Federal Reserve would grab headlines, White House economic adviser Stephen Miran's dissent and way-below consensus interest rate projection on Wednesday delivered.】

item.title: 新西兰第二季度经济弱于预期，萎缩 0.9
item.description: 由于美国关税的不确定性加剧以及房地产市场的持续疲软，新西兰第二季度的经济萎缩程度超出预期。【原文：New Zealand's economy shrank more than expected in the second quarter as heightened uncertainty around U.S. tariffs and ongoing weakness in the housing market weighed.】

item.title: 消息人士称，网络安全公司 Netskope 首次公开募股融资 9.08 亿美元
item.description: 据一位熟悉内情的消息人士透露，网络安全公司 Netskope 在美国首次公开募股中募集了 9.08 亿美元，股票定价为每股 19 美元，处于市场定价区间的顶端。【原文：Cybersecurity firm Netskope raised $908 million in its U.S. initial public offering, pricing its stock at the top of the marketed range at $19 a share, according to a source familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 美国广播公司将无限期停播 "吉米-金梅尔现场直播"，因其发表了关于柯克的言论
item.description: 迪斯尼旗下的美国广播公司（ABC）周三表示，将无限期停播 "吉米-基梅尔现场直播 "节目，因为这位深夜节目主持人就查理-柯克遇刺事件发表的言论遭到了美国联邦通信委员会负责人的严厉批评。【原文：Walt Disney-owned ABC said on Wednesday it will indefinitely stop airing "Jimmy Kimmel Live" after remarks the late-night host made about Charlie Kirk's assassination came under harsh criticism from the head of the Federal Communications Commission.】

item.title: 穆迪指出甲骨文近期签订的 3,000 亿美元人工智能合同存在风险
item.description: 美国信用评级机构穆迪评级公司（Moody's Ratings）指出了甲骨文公司最近签署的 3,000 亿美元人工智能合同中的几个潜在风险，但没有对这家软件巨头采取评级行动。【原文：U.S. credit rating agency Moody's Ratings flagged several potential risks in Oracle Corp's $300 billion of recently signed artificial intelligence contracts, but stopped short of taking ratings action against the software giant.】

item.title: 美联储鲍威尔解释央行适度利率授权如何运作
item.description: 美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）周三解释了为什么国会强加给央行的三项任务在现实条件下加起来是两项。【原文：Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell on Wednesday explained why the three missions Congress imposed on the central bank add up to two in real-world conditions.】

item.title: 高管称美国最繁忙港口已提前迎来假日进口旺季
item.description: 周三，美国最繁忙海港的高层管理人员表示，美国零售商至少提前一个月完成了假日商品的进口，以限制与唐纳德-特朗普总统不断变化的关税政策相关的成本。【原文：U.S. retailers have wrapped up imports of holiday goods at least a month early in a bid to limit costs tied to President Donald Trump's evolving tariff policies, the top executive at the nation's busiest seaport said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 英国称美国国事访问带来创纪录的 1500 亿英镑投资
item.description: 英国政府周三援引自己的数据称，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普对英国的国事访问已经带来了1500亿英镑（约合2048.7亿美元）的外来投资。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump's state visit to Britain has generated 150 billion pounds ($204.87 billion) of inward investment, the British government said on Wednesday citing its own data which compiled new and previously announced pledges.】

item.title: 业内官员称，特朗普打压 DEI 进一步限制了美国飞机机械师的供应
item.description: 业内官员告诉路透社，由于政府试图从自己的可用拨款通知中删除有关多元化、公平和包容的内容，旨在培训以男性为主的劳动力的资金被搁置，解决美国飞机机械师短缺问题的计划陷入困境。【原文：Plans to combat a U.S. shortage of aircraft mechanics are in limbo after funds aimed at training a mostly male workforce are being held up by government efforts to remove mention of diversity, equity and inclusion from its own notices of available grants, industry officials told Reuters.】

item.title: 美联储降息后美国大银行下调最优惠贷款利率
item.description: 在美联储今年首次降息后，美国主要贷款机构周三下调了一项关键利率，为美国消费者提供了借贷成本方面的缓和措施。【原文：Major U.S. lenders lowered a key interest rate on Wednesday, providing U.S. consumers a reprieve on borrowing costs, after the Federal Reserve cut interest rates for the first time this year.】

item.title: 交易日：美联储减息，市场不知何去何从
item.description: 交易日【原文：TRADING DAY】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，特斯拉重新设计门把手，因安全问题而备受关注
item.description: 特斯拉公司的长期设计总监弗朗茨-冯-霍尔茨豪森（Franz von Holzhausen）周三在彭博新闻播客中表示，特斯拉正在寻求将电子和手动车门释放装置合并，目前这两种装置分别位于不同的位置。【原文：Tesla is looking to combine the electronic and manual door-release mechanisms, which are currently in separate locations, the company's longtime design chief, Franz von Holzhausen, said on a Bloomberg News podcast on Wednesday.】

item.title: 消息人士称，Blackstone 和 TPG 恢复了收购 Hologic 的兴趣
item.description: 一位接近交易的人士周三表示，私募股权投资公司 Blackstone 和 TPG 恢复了对收购医疗设备制造商 Hologic 的兴趣。【原文：Private equity firms Blackstone and TPG revived their interest in acquiring medical device maker Hologic , a person close to the transaction said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 美国中国问题特别委员会负责人关注 TikTok 交易
item.description: 美国众议院中共问题特别委员会共和党主席周三表示，他对有关中美达成框架协议，将短视频应用 TikTok 转为美国控股的报道感到担忧。【原文：The Republican chair of the House Select Committee on the Chinese Communist Party on Wednesday said he is concerned by reports about a U.S.-China framework deal to switch short-video app TikTok to U.S.-controlled ownership.】

item.title: DoubleLine Capital 首席执行官冈拉克称美联储降息 25 个基点是正确之举
item.description: DoubleLine Capital 首席执行官杰弗里-冈德拉克（Jeffrey Gundlach）周三在接受 CNBC 采访时表示，在美联储当天早些时候降息之后，降息 25 个基点是正确的举措。【原文：DoubleLine Capital's CEO Jeffrey Gundlach said in a CNBC interview on Wednesday that the 25-basis-point rate cut is the right move, after the Federal Reserve cut interest rates earlier in the day.】

item.title: 迪士尼与员工达成的 2.33 亿美元和解协议获批
item.description: 加州一名法官批准了华特迪士尼与 51478 名迪士尼乐园员工达成的 2.33 亿美元和解协议。【原文：A California judge has approved Walt Disney's $233 million settlement with 51,478 Disneyland employees who said the entertainment company denied them a living wage.】

item.title: 爱马仕再次击败因 Birkin 手袋一包难求而提起的集体诉讼
item.description: 法国奢侈品牌爱马仕（Hermes）第二次说服美国法官驳回一项诉讼，该诉讼指控爱马仕违反反垄断法，强迫买家在购买该时尚公司著名的 Birkin 手袋之前花费数千美元购买其产品。【原文：French luxury brand Hermes has convinced a U.S. judge to dismiss for a second time a lawsuit alleging it violates antitrust law by forcing buyers to spend thousands of dollars on its products before they can purchase one of the fashion company's famed Birkin handbags.】

item.title: 日经新闻》报道：苹果探索在台湾试产可折叠 iPhone
item.description: 日经新闻》（Nikkei）周四称，苹果公司已与供应商就可能在台湾试产可折叠 iPhone 进行了讨论，目标是在印度大规模生产该设备，并于 2026 年发布。【原文：Apple has held discussions with suppliers for a possible test production of foldable iPhones in Taiwan, aiming to mass produce the device in India for release in 2026, the Nikkei said on Thursday.】

item.title: 谷歌与贝宝合作在各平台推出人工智能解决方案
item.description: 谷歌（Google）和贝宝（PayPal）周三表示，双方已建立多年战略合作伙伴关系，将为用户带来全新的人工智能购物和支付体验。【原文：Google and PayPal have entered a multi-year strategic partnership to bring new AI shopping and payment experiences to their users, the companies said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 美联储鲍威尔称央行将裁员 10
item.description: 美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）周三表示，美国中央银行的员工队伍正在明显缩减。【原文：Federal Reserve Chairman Jerome Powell said Wednesday the U.S. central bank is undergoing a notable reduction in the ranks of those who work for the institution.】

item.title: 波音公司和霍尼韦尔公司被印度航空公司空难遇难者家属起诉
item.description: 在今年 6 月印度航空公司 171 号航班失事中丧生的四名乘客的家属起诉波音公司和霍尼韦尔公司，指责它们的疏忽和燃油切断开关故障导致了这起造成 260 人死亡的事故。【原文：The families of four passengers who died in the June crash of Air India Flight 171 sued Boeing and Honeywell , blaming their negligence and a faulty fuel cutoff switch for the accident, which killed 260 people.】

item.title: 美联储鲍威尔表示不会大力推动更大幅度的降息
item.description: 美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）周三在美联储将政策利率下调四分之一个百分点后表示，在本周的美联储会议上，没有人普遍支持将利率下调半个百分点。【原文：There was no widespread support for a larger, half-percentage-point interest rate cut at the Federal Reserve meeting this week, Fed Chair Jerome Powell said on Wednesday, after the central bank cut its policy rate by a quarter point.】

item.title: 即时观点：美联储降息四分之一个百分点后分析师的反应
item.description: 美联储周三将利率下调了四分之一个百分点，并表示将在今年余下的时间里稳步降低借贷成本，因为决策者们对就业市场疲软的担忧做出了回应，此举赢得了唐纳德-特朗普总统任命的大多数央行官员的支持。【原文：The Federal Reserve cut interest rates by a quarter of a percentage point on Wednesday and indicated it will steadily lower borrowing costs for the rest of this year, as policymakers responded to concerns about weakness in the job market in a move that won support from most of President Donald Trump's central bank appointees.】

item.title: 美联储降息 25 个基点后，美国利率期货提高了 10 月份进一步宽松的概率
item.description: 周三，衡量银行间无担保隔夜贷款成本的联邦基金利率期货进一步提高了美联储在10月会议上再次降息的概率，概率为94.1%。【原文：Futures on the federal funds rate, which measure the cost of unsecured overnight loans between banks, further raised the odds on Wednesday that the Federal Reserve will deliver another interest rate cut at the October meeting, with a 94.1% probability.】

item.title: 竞购 TikTok 或表示有兴趣的团体
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）周二宣布，中美两国达成协议，让TikTok继续在美国运营，这是两国最大经济体之间长达数月的谈判取得的突破性进展，双方正努力化解令全球市场不安的大范围贸易战。【原文：President Donald Trump on Tuesday announced an agreement between the U.S. and China to keep TikTok operating in the United States, a breakthrough in months-long talks between the two biggest economies as they seek to defuse a wide-ranging trade war that has unnerved global markets.】

item.title: 美国央行行长在利率路径问题上意见分歧较大
item.description: 根据最新预测的中值，美国央行行长在周三将短期利率下调四分之一个百分点后，预计今年将再将短期利率下调半个百分点。【原文：U.S. central bankers expect to cut short-term interest rates by another half of a percentage point this year after delivering a quarter-point cut on Wednesday, based on the median of fresh projections.】

item.title: 意大利颁布涵盖隐私、监督和儿童访问的人工智能法
item.description: 意大利议会周三批准了一项涵盖人工智能的新法律，使意大利成为第一个拥有与欧盟具有里程碑意义的《人工智能法》相一致的全面人工智能法规的欧盟国家。【原文：Italy's parliament on Wednesday approved a new law covering artificial intelligence, making it the first European Union country with comprehensive AI regulations aligned with the EU's landmark AI Act.】

item.title: 独家报道健身追踪应用 Strava 寻求聘请银行进行 IPO
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士透露，流行的健身追踪平台 Strava 正在为其美国首次公开募股寻找投资银行。【原文：Strava, the popular fitness tracking platform, is looking to hire investment banks for its U.S. initial public offering, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 美国联邦贸易委员会称，手指检测台锯规则将损害竞争
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普领导的联邦贸易委员会周三表示，要求美国台锯制造商使用一家公司的手指检测专利技术的提案应与其他170多项妨碍竞争的法规一起被撤销。【原文：A proposal to require U.S. table saw manufacturers to use one company's patented finger detection technology should be dropped along with more than 170 other regulations that hamper competition, President Donald Trump's Federal Trade Commission said on Wednesday.】
